Index.title: Hello world!
Index.description: This is a multi-language site for a Onesight challenge.

JobOpportunity.jobDescription: Do you know NextJS or ReactJS and would like to work on a dynamic project, in continuous evolution, focusing on good practices? The position is for an entry level resource.
JobOpportunity.skillsDescription: The following knowledge will be used in the project (not all are necessary):
JobOpportunity.responsibilitiesDescription: Work on the development and improvement of a new frontend for a project in production. With support from the team allocated to the project and cross-team work. Work with the team to improve general knowledge. Focus on a dynamic project with quick releases and constant improvement. Learning new technologies and Fullstack path.
JobOpportunity.qualificationsDescription: At least 1 year of experience with Javascript (mainly React).
jobDetailsDescription: Full remote with flexible schedule (align with the team for the execution of Dailys)
Possible contract 4 days / 5 days per week
European vacation model (2 days per month and being able to use the vacation already from the second month)
Planned annual growth above market average
